N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 §§ 28-1.14 - Leave for professional meetings

State Regulations

Subject to prior approval by the appointing authority, each employee may be allowed time off without charge to leave credits to attend
conferences or seminars of recognized professional organizations, such
conferences or seminars to be directly related to the employee's profession or
professional duties. Requests for such leave may be approved to the extent that
such absence would not interfere with the proper conduct of governmental
functions. Notes
